title: Because bigger is better
body: <a title="Ern" href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog" >Ern</a> just sent me a link to <a href="http://hugeurl.com/">http://hugeurl.com/</a> (making fun of <a href="http://tinyurl.com/">http://tinyurl.com/</a>).  I guess it's prolly only funny to us geeks.<br>Here's an example: <a href="http://hugeurl.com/?">http://hugeurl.com/?</a>
